review.reviewBody: Must try their Diya Special Platter good quantity  and panner was so fresh taste v￼ery delicious  love love
the rotis were not fresh, a day older probably, disappointed experience
Best vegetarian restaurant in surrey best tawa parantha amritsari kulcha chole bhatura vegetaible biryani paneer butter masala kadai paneer mix veg paneer burji kulfi badam milkrabdi faluda noodles

Samosa was bit oily but it happens sometimes,  the taste was Awesome, all items of Veg Thali were very tasty
The veg thali has Paneer Sabji mix Veg Sabji Dal makhani Rice 2 chapati and 1 rasgulla
All in different containers. Order and feel the Indian Taste, spices were perfet
Rara Paneer is the best but the size of Puri, Plain Paratha, Tandoori and Tawa roti is too small. And also increase 2oz size of chole and aloo sabzi.
